    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      InstalledBBjPlugininstallPlugin(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!, Tag tag!)
      InstalledBBjPlugininstallPlugin(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!, Tag tag!, String username!, String password!)
      voidmapPluginNames(ArrayList installedPlugins!, ArrayList remotePlugins!)

      Iterates through the list of installed plugins and sets the names according to the remote plugin's name.

      This method was created because in some cases the bbj plugin repository name differed from the plugin name defined in the bbj-plugin.json causing some strange side effects.

      voidmove(File directory!, File target!)

      Moves the given directory to the given target directory.

      voiduninstallPlugin(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)

      • installPlugin

        public InstalledBBjPlugin installPlugin(RemoteBBjPlugin remotePlugin!, Tag tag!, String username!, String password!)

      • mapPluginNames

        public void mapPluginNames(ArrayList installedPlugins!, ArrayList remotePlugins!)

        Iterates through the list of installed plugins and sets the names according to the remote plugin's name.

        This method was created because in some cases the bbj plugin repository name differed from the plugin name defined in the bbj-plugin.json causing some strange side effects.

      • move

        public void move(File directory!, File target!)

        Moves the given directory to the given target directory.

        Parameters:
        directory! The directory to be moved into the target
        target! The target directory where the directory is going to be moved

        public void uninstallPlugin(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)
